channel.title: reinforcement on Alok's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in reinforcement on Alok's Blog

item.title: MUZero
item.description: MuZero: – Works based on AlphaZero’s search and planning space – Learns optimal policy, reward functions, value functions automatically – The main idea of the algorithm is to predict those aspects of the future that are directly relevant for planning. – Observation image ===> Model ==> Encodes to hidden states ==> Hidden states updated using previous step’s hidden state and hypothetical next action – In each step, model predicts value fn, optimal policy, and immediate reward
